summary: The PHP SDK worker needs to send sdk-name and sdk-version headers in gRPC requests, similar to what the PHP client already does. This requires implementing gRPC interceptors to override headers sent by the underlying SDK.
userImpact: Without these headers, server-side telemetry and logging cannot properly identify which SDK version made requests from workers.
proposedFix: Use gRPC interceptors to override the headers sent by the Go SDK
keyQuote: The client already does this, needs to be implemented in the worker too.
